title: How can you get your kids into coding? We asked an 8-year-old app builder.
description: Ben welcomes Ricky Robinett, VP of Developer Relations and Community at Cloudflare, and his eight-year-old daughter Fay for a chat about how AI tools are helping new developers get started and how to encourage your kids to try coding.
author: Eira May
excerpt: Watch Fay build a Harry Potter-themed chatbot with an assist from AI.
